--- full_edge_left.sql
  <-[a]-
--- AST
&ast.GQLPathPattern{
  PathTermList: []*ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
    &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
      Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
      PathTerm: &ast.GQLFullEdgeLeft{
        Lt:            2,
        Hyphen:        7,
        PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
          Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 5,
            NameEnd: 6,
            Name:    "a",
          },
          IsLabelCondition: (*ast.GQLIsLabelCondition)(nil),
          Filter:           nil,
        },
      },
      Quantifier: nil,
    },
  },
}
